title: New: Solar Year – Magic Idea
body:
Having recently signed to the [No Fear Of Pop](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18638-new-solar-year-night-day/nofearofpop.net) curated label Stratosfear, Montreal duo **Solar Year** have released the b-side to their single, [_Night & Day_.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18638-new-solar-year-night-day/ "New: Solar Year – Night & Day") The track is called _Magic Idea_, an at times futuristically baron wasteland, at others, a warm and wondrous affair. What’s certain is that the duo are making some seriously interesting pop music.

The release is due out on January 7th. Pre-order a copy—limited to 300—[here](http://stratosfearic.net/), download both tracks [here](https://itunes.apple.com/no/album/night-and-day-single/id578140071).
